001package squidpony.squidmath;
002
003import static squidpony.squidmath.Noise.*;
004import static squidpony.squidmath.SeededNoise.*;
005
006/**
007 * "Classic Perlin" noise, as opposed to the Simplex Noise also created by Ken Perlin (which is produced by
008 * {@link SeededNoise}; both can be produced by {@link FastNoise}).
009 * This noise can in theory be scaled up to arbitrary dimensions, but in practice uses unreasonably hefty amounts of
010 * memory when dimensionality exceeds 10 or so, since it needs to hash {@code Math.pow(2, dimensionality)} points per
011 * sample of noise, which involves over a thousand points in 10 dimensions and over a million points in 20 dimensions.
012 * For that reason, it's limited to 6D noise here, and also implements 2D, 3D, and 4D. Its performance is surprisingly
013 * good at 2D, 3D, and 4D but trails off quickly at 6D. Its quality is worse than normal simplex noise in 2D, but you
014 * can use {@link JitterNoise} (which takes the same algorithm and distorts the grid pseudo-randomly) to get unusually
015 * high-quality 2D noise. The quality is actually quite good in 4D and higher; there's often some rhythmic patterns in
016 * 3D when time is z, but with 4 or 6 dimensions this can have fewer artifacts than Simplex in the same dimension. The
017 * 3D and higher dimensionality versions don't seem to need jitter to avoid grid artifacts, at least most of the time.
018 * This uses different gradient vectors than what was recommended in the "Improved Perlin Noise" paper, since the ones
019 * this uses avoid 45-degree angular artifacts in all dimensions implemented.
020 * <br>
021 * ClassicNoise is a good choice with parts of {@link squidpony.squidgrid.mapping.WorldMapGenerator} that need a
022 * Noise3D implementation, and it tends to about as fast as {@link SeededNoise} in 3D. It is not recommended for 2D
023 * use; prefer {@link JitterNoise} or {@link SeededNoise} for that. You can also use {@link FastNoise} with
024 * {@link FastNoise#PERLIN_FRACTAL} as the noiseType if you primarily want to use float input and get float output.
025 * If you want higher-dimensional noise than this supports, you can use {@link PhantomNoise}.
026 */
027public class ClassicNoise implements Noise.Noise2D, Noise.Noise3D, Noise.Noise4D, Noise.Noise5D, Noise.Noise6D {
028    public static final ClassicNoise instance = new ClassicNoise();
029    public long seed;
030    public ClassicNoise() {
031        this(0x1337BEEFCAFEL);
032    }
033
034    public ClassicNoise(final long seed) {
035        this.seed = seed;
036    }
037    protected static double gradCoord2D(long seed, int x, int y,
038                                        double xd, double yd) {
039        final int hash = ((int)(((seed ^= 0xB4C4D * x ^ 0xEE2C3 * y) ^ seed >>> 13) * (seed)));
040        final double[] grad = grad2d[hash >>> 24];
041        return xd * grad[0] + yd * grad[1];
042    }
043    protected static double gradCoord3D(long seed, int x, int y, int z, double xd, double yd, double zd) {
044        final int hash =
045                ((int)(((seed ^= 0xB4C4D * x ^ 0xEE2C1 * y ^ 0xA7E07 * z) ^ seed >>> 13) * (seed))
046                        >>> 27) * 3;
047        return (xd * grad3d[hash] + yd * grad3d[hash + 1] + zd * grad3d[hash + 2]);
048    }
049    protected static double gradCoord4D(long seed, int x, int y, int z, int w,
050                                        double xd, double yd, double zd, double wd) {
051        final int hash =
052                ((int)(((seed ^= 0xB4C4D * x ^ 0xEE2C1 * y ^ 0xA7E07 * z ^ 0xCD5E9 * w) ^ seed >>> 13) * (seed))
053                        >>> 24) & -4;
054        return xd * grad4d[hash] + yd * grad4d[hash + 1] + zd * grad4d[hash + 2] + wd * grad4d[hash + 3];
055    }
056    protected static double gradCoord5D(long seed, int x, int y, int z, int w, int u,
057                                        double xd, double yd, double zd, double wd, double ud) {
058        final int hash =
059                ((int)(((seed ^= 0xB4C4D * x ^ 0xEE2C1 * y ^ 0xA7E07 * z ^ 0xCD5E9 * w ^ 0x94B5B * u)
060                        ^ seed >>> 13) * (seed))
061                        >>> 24) * 5;
062        return xd * grad5d[hash] + yd * grad5d[hash + 1] + zd * grad5d[hash + 2]
063                + wd * grad5d[hash + 3] + ud * grad5d[hash + 4];
064    }
065    
066    protected static double gradCoord6D(long seed, int x, int y, int z, int w, int u, int v,
067                                        double xd, double yd, double zd, double wd, double ud, double vd) {
068        final int hash =
069                ((int)(((seed ^= 0xB4C4D * x ^ 0xEE2C1 * y ^ 0xA7E07 * z ^ 0xCD5E9 * w ^ 0x94B5B * u ^ 0xD2385 * v)
070                        ^ seed >>> 13) * (seed))
071                        >>> 24) * 6;
072        return xd * grad6d[hash] + yd * grad6d[hash + 1] + zd * grad6d[hash + 2]
073                + wd * grad6d[hash + 3] + ud * grad6d[hash + 4] + vd * grad6d[hash + 5];
074    }
075    
076    
077//    protected static double gradCoord2DJitter(long seed, int x, int y,
078//                                              double xd, double yd) {
079//        final int hash = ((int)(((seed ^= 0xB4C4D * x ^ 0xEE2C3 * y) ^ seed >>> 13) * (seed)));
080//        final double[] grad = phiGrad2[hash >>> 24], jitter = phiGrad2[hash >>> 16 & 0xFF];
081//        return (xd + jitter[0] * 0.5) * grad[0] + (yd + jitter[1] * 0.5) * grad[1];
082//    }
083
084    @Override
085    public double getNoise(final double x, final double y) {
086        return getNoiseWithSeed(x, y, seed);
087    }
088
089    @Override
090    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, final long seed) {
091        x *= 2.0;
092        y *= 2.0;
093        final int
094                x0 = fastFloor(x),
095                y0 = fastFloor(y);         
096//        final double res =
097        return 
098                Noise.emphasizeSigned(cerp(cerp(gradCoord2D(seed, x0, y0, x - x0, y - y0), gradCoord2D(seed, x0+1, y0, x - x0 - 1, y - y0), x - x0),
099                                cerp(gradCoord2D(seed, x0, y0+1, x - x0, y - y0-1), gradCoord2D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, x - x0 - 1, y - y0 - 1), x - x0),
100                                y - y0) * 1.4142);//* 0.875;// * 1.4142;
101//        if(res < -1.0 || res > 1.0) System.out.println(res);
102//        return res;
103    }
104
105    @Override
106    public double getNoise(final double x, final double y, final double z) {
107        return getNoiseWithSeed(x, y, z, seed);
108    }
109
110    @Override
111    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, final long seed) {
112        x *= 2.0;
113        y *= 2.0;
114        z *= 2.0;
115        final int
116                x0 = fastFloor(x),
117                y0 = fastFloor(y),
118                z0 = fastFloor(z);
119//        final double res =
120         return 
121                 Noise.emphasizeSigned(cerp(cerp(cerp(gradCoord3D(seed, x0, y0, z0, x - x0, y - y0, z - z0), gradCoord3D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0, x - x0 - 1, y - y0, z - z0), x - x0),
122                cerp(gradCoord3D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0, x - x0, y - y0-1, z - z0), gradCoord3D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0, x - x0 - 1, y - y0 - 1, z - z0), x - x0),
123                y - y0),
124                cerp(cerp(gradCoord3D(seed, x0, y0, z0+1, x - x0, y - y0, z - z0-1), gradCoord3D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0+1, x - x0 - 1, y - y0, z - z0-1), x - x0),
125                        cerp(gradCoord3D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0+1, x - x0, y - y0-1, z - z0-1), gradCoord3D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0+1, x - x0 - 1, y - y0 - 1, z - z0-1), x - x0),
126                        y - y0), z - z0) * 1.0625);
127//        if(res < -1 || res > 1) System.out.println(res);
128//        return res;
129    }
130
131    @Override
132    public double getNoise(final double x, final double y, final double z, final double w) {
133        return getNoiseWithSeed(x, y, z, w, seed);
134    }
135
136    @Override
137    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, double w, final long seed) {
138        x *= 2.0;
139        y *= 2.0;
140        z *= 2.0;
141        w *= 2.0;
142        final int
143                x0 = fastFloor(x),
144                y0 = fastFloor(y),
145                z0 = fastFloor(z),
146                w0 = fastFloor(w);
147//        final double res =
148        return
149                Noise.emphasizeSigned(cerp(cerp(cerp(cerp(gradCoord4D(seed, x0, y0, z0, w0, x - x0, y - y0, z - z0, w - w0), gradCoord4D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0, w0, x - x0 - 1, y - y0, z - z0, w - w0), x - x0),
150                        cerp(gradCoord4D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0, w0, x - x0, y - y0-1, z - z0, w - w0), gradCoord4D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0, w0, x - x0 - 1, y - y0 - 1, z - z0, w - w0), x - x0),
151                        y - y0),
152                        cerp(cerp(gradCoord4D(seed, x0, y0, z0+1, w0, x - x0, y - y0, z - z0-1, w - w0), gradCoord4D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0+1, w0, x - x0 - 1, y - y0, z - z0-1, w - w0), x - x0),
153                                cerp(gradCoord4D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0+1, w0, x - x0, y - y0-1, z - z0-1, w - w0), gradCoord4D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0+1, w0, x - x0 - 1, y - y0 - 1, z - z0-1, w - w0), x - x0),
154                                y - y0), 
155                        z - z0),
156                        cerp(cerp(cerp(gradCoord4D(seed, x0, y0, z0, w0+1, x - x0, y - y0, z - z0, w - w0 - 1), gradCoord4D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0, w0+1, x - x0 - 1, y - y0, z - z0, w - w0 - 1), x - x0),
157                                cerp(gradCoord4D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0, w0+1, x - x0, y - y0-1, z - z0, w - w0 - 1), gradCoord4D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0, w0+1, x - x0 - 1, y - y0 - 1, z - z0, w - w0 - 1), x - x0),
158                                y - y0),
159                                cerp(cerp(gradCoord4D(seed, x0, y0, z0+1, w0+1, x - x0, y - y0, z - z0-1, w - w0 - 1), gradCoord4D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0+1, w0+1, x - x0 - 1, y - y0, z - z0-1, w - w0 - 1), x - x0),
160                                        cerp(gradCoord4D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0+1, w0+1, x - x0, y - y0-1, z - z0-1, w - w0 - 1), gradCoord4D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0+1, w0+1, x - x0 - 1, y - y0 - 1, z - z0-1, w - w0 - 1), x - x0),
161                                        y - y0),
162                                z - z0),
163                        w - w0) * 0.555);
164//        if(res < -1 || res > 1) System.out.println(res);
165//        return res;
166    }
167
168
169    @Override
170    public double getNoise(final double x, final double y, final double z, final double w, final double u) {
171        return getNoiseWithSeed(x, y, z, w, u, seed);
172    }
173
174    @Override
175    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, double w, double u, long seed) {
176        x *= 2.0;
177        y *= 2.0;
178        z *= 2.0;
179        w *= 2.0;
180        u *= 2.0;
181        final int
182                x0 = fastFloor(x),
183                y0 = fastFloor(y),
184                z0 = fastFloor(z),
185                w0 = fastFloor(w),
186                u0 = fastFloor(u);
187        final double xd = x - x0, yd = y - y0, zd = z - z0, wd = w - w0, ud = u - u0;
188        //ad * ad * ad * (ad * (ad * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0)
189        final double xc = xd * xd * xd * (xd * (xd * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
190        final double yc = yd * yd * yd * (yd * (yd * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
191        final double zc = zd * zd * zd * (zd * (zd * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
192        final double wc = wd * wd * wd * (wd * (wd * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
193        final double uc = ud * ud * ud * (ud * (ud * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
194//        
195//        final double xc = xd * xd * (3.0 - 2.0 * xd);
196//        final double yc = yd * yd * (3.0 - 2.0 * yd);
197//        final double zc = zd * zd * (3.0 - 2.0 * zd);
198//        final double wc = wd * wd * (3.0 - 2.0 * wd);
199//        final double uc = ud * ud * (3.0 - 2.0 * ud);
200//        
201//        final double res =
202        return 
203                Noise.emphasizeSigned(
204                lerp(lerp(
205                        lerp(
206                                lerp(
207                                        lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0, z0, w0, u0, xd, yd, zd, wd, ud),
208                                                gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0, w0, u0, xd-1, yd, zd, wd, ud), xc),
209                                        lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0, w0, u0, xd, yd-1, zd, wd, ud),
210                                                gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0, w0, u0, xd-1, yd-1, zd, wd, ud), xc),
211                                        yc),
212                                lerp(
213                                        lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0, z0+1, w0, u0, xd, yd, zd-1, wd, ud),
214                                                gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0+1, w0, u0, xd-1, yd, zd-1, wd, ud), xc),
215                                        lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0+1, w0, u0, xd, yd-1, zd-1, wd, ud),
216                                                gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0+1, w0, u0, xd-1, yd-1, zd-1, wd, ud), xc),
217                                        yc),
218                                zc),
219                        lerp(
220                                lerp(
221                                        lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0, z0, w0+1, u0, xd, yd, zd, wd-1, ud),
222                                                gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0, w0+1, u0, xd-1, yd, zd, wd-1, ud), xc),
223                                        lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0, w0+1, u0, xd, yd-1, zd, wd-1, ud),
224                                                gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0, w0+1, u0, xd-1, yd-1, zd, wd-1, ud), xc),
225                                        yc),
226                                lerp(
227                                        lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0, z0+1, w0+1, u0, xd, yd, zd-1, wd-1, ud),
228                                                gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0+1, w0+1, u0, xd-1, yd, zd-1, wd-1, ud), xc),
229                                        lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0+1, w0+1, u0, xd, yd-1, zd-1, wd-1, ud),
230                                                gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0+1, w0+1, u0, xd-1, yd-1, zd-1, wd-1, ud), xc),
231                                        yc),
232                                zc),
233                        wc),
234                        lerp(
235                                lerp(
236                                        lerp(
237                                                lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0, z0, w0, u0+1, xd, yd, zd, wd, ud-1),
238                                                        gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0, w0, u0+1, xd-1, yd, zd, wd, ud-1), xc),
239                                                lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0, w0, u0+1, xd, yd-1, zd, wd, ud-1),
240                                                        gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0, w0, u0+1, xd-1, yd-1, zd, wd, ud-1), xc),
241                                                yc),
242                                        lerp(
243                                                lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0, z0+1, w0, u0+1, xd, yd, zd-1, wd, ud-1),
244                                                        gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0+1, w0, u0+1, xd-1, yd, zd-1, wd, ud-1), xc),
245                                                lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0+1, w0, u0+1, xd, yd-1, zd-1, wd, ud-1),
246                                                        gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0+1, w0, u0+1, xd-1, yd-1, zd-1, wd, ud-1), xc),
247                                                yc),
248                                        zc),
249                                lerp(
250                                        lerp(
251                                                lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0, z0, w0+1, u0+1, xd, yd, zd, wd-1, ud-1),
252                                                        gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0, w0+1, u0+1, xd-1, yd, zd, wd-1, ud-1), xc),
253                                                lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0, w0+1, u0+1, xd, yd-1, zd, wd-1, ud-1),
254                                                        gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0, w0+1, u0+1, xd-1, yd-1, zd, wd-1, ud-1), xc),
255                                                yc),
256                                        lerp(
257                                                lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0, z0+1, w0+1, u0+1, xd, yd, zd-1, wd-1, ud-1),
258                                                        gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0+1, w0+1, u0+1, xd-1, yd, zd-1, wd-1, ud-1), xc),
259                                                lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0+1, w0+1, u0+1, xd, yd-1, zd-1, wd-1, ud-1),
260                                                        gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0+1, w0+1, u0+1, xd-1, yd-1, zd-1, wd-1, ud-1), xc),
261                                                yc),
262                                        zc),
263                                wc),
264                        uc) );
265//        if(res < -1 || res > 1) System.out.println(res);
266//        return res;
267    }
268
269    @Override
270    public double getNoise(final double x, final double y, final double z, final double w, final double u, final double v) {
271        return getNoiseWithSeed(x, y, z, w, u, v, seed);
272    }
273
274    @Override
275    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, double w, double u, double v, long seed) {
276        x *= 2.0;
277        y *= 2.0;
278        z *= 2.0;
279        w *= 2.0;
280        u *= 2.0;
281        v *= 2.0;
282        final int
283                x0 = fastFloor(x),
284                y0 = fastFloor(y),
285                z0 = fastFloor(z),
286                w0 = fastFloor(w),
287                u0 = fastFloor(u),
288                v0 = fastFloor(v);
289        final double xd = x - x0, yd = y - y0, zd = z - z0, wd = w - w0, ud = u - u0, vd = v - v0;
290//        final double res =
291        return Noise.emphasizeSigned(
292                cerp(cerp(cerp(
293                        cerp(
294                                cerp(
295                                        cerp(gradCoord6D(seed, x0, y0, z0, w0, u0, v0, xd, yd, zd, wd, ud, vd),
296                                                gradCoord6D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0, w0, u0, v0, xd-1, yd, zd, wd, ud, vd), xd),
297                                        cerp(gradCoord6D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0, w0, u0, v0, xd, yd-1, zd, wd, ud, vd),
298                                                gradCoord6D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0, w0, u0, v0, xd-1, yd-1, zd, wd, ud, vd), xd),
299                                        yd),
300                                cerp(
301                                        cerp(gradCoord6D(seed, x0, y0, z0+1, w0, u0, v0, xd, yd, zd-1, wd, ud, vd),
302                                                gradCoord6D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0+1, w0, u0, v0, xd-1, yd, zd-1, wd, ud, vd), xd),
303                                        cerp(gradCoord6D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0+1, w0, u0, v0, xd, yd-1, zd-1, wd, ud, vd),
304                                                gradCoord6D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0+1, w0, u0, v0, xd-1, yd-1, zd-1, wd, ud, vd), xd),
305                                        yd),
306                                zd),
307                        cerp(
308                                cerp(
309                                        cerp(gradCoord6D(seed, x0, y0, z0, w0+1, u0, v0, xd, yd, zd, wd-1, ud, vd),
310                                                gradCoord6D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0, w0+1, u0, v0, xd-1, yd, zd, wd-1, ud, vd), xd),
311                                        cerp(gradCoord6D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0, w0+1, u0, v0, xd, yd-1, zd, wd-1, ud, vd),
312                                                gradCoord6D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0, w0+1, u0, v0, xd-1, yd-1, zd, wd-1, ud, vd), xd),
313                                        yd),
314                                cerp(
315                                        cerp(gradCoord6D(seed, x0, y0, z0+1, w0+1, u0, v0, xd, yd, zd-1, wd-1, ud, vd),
316                                                gradCoord6D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0+1, w0+1, u0, v0, xd-1, yd, zd-1, wd-1, ud, vd), xd),
317                                        cerp(gradCoord6D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0+1, w0+1, u0, v0, xd, yd-1, zd-1, wd-1, ud, vd),
318                                                gradCoord6D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0+1, w0+1, u0, v0, xd-1, yd-1, zd-1, wd-1, ud, vd), xd),
319                                        yd),
320                                zd),
321                        wd),
322                        cerp(
323                                cerp(
324                                        cerp(
325                                                cerp(gradCoord6D(seed, x0, y0, z0, w0, u0+1, v0, xd, yd, zd, wd, ud-1, vd),
326                                                        gradCoord6D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0, w0, u0+1, v0, xd-1, yd, zd, wd, ud-1, vd), xd),
